pages.text: Surrounding land is frozen by the touch of winter, as layers of snow build up all around.$(br2)In addition to freezing water into ice, lava is converted to obsidian or cobblestone, and farmland is temporarily moisturized.$(br2)$(info) Finally, snow golems will spawn in the ritual area, and be healed while they remain in it.
As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier 0$() ritual, there are no additional requirements to complete this ritual.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:frost_lands/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Ritual area extends $(ritual:frost_lands/radius_x) and $(ritual:frost_lands/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:frost_lands/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Snow Golems:$() Golems are healed every $(ritual:frost_lands/SECONDS/interval_snowman_heal) seconds, and have a $(ritual:frost_lands/PERCENT/interval_snowman_spawn) chance to spawn every tick.
